title: Kristin sees man fall which decrease helping

content.prompt: Kristin sees a forty-year-old man fall to the ground. According to studies on prosocial behavior, which of the following situations would decrease the likelihood of her helping him?

choices.label: The man clearly states that he needs help.
The man fell at a crowded farmers market.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
